articles.description: KATE, the Duchess of Cambridge, and Prince William could 'struggle to inspire enthusiasm' among the British public when they eventually take over as King and Queen, the CEO of Republic has claimed.

articles.author: Kate Nicholson
articles.title: Prince Harry accused of ‘double standards’ over attitude towards The Crown - Daily Express
articles.description: PRINCE HARRY was accused of having 'double standards' in his attitude towards The Crown by a royal commentator, after his new interview with James Corden aired last week.

articles.title: Prince Philip requested Prince Charles visit him in hospital to ‘discuss the future of the royal family’ - iNews
articles.description: Dickie Arbiter, who was the Queen's press secretary, made the comments
articles.content:
Prince Philip requested Prince Charles visit him at hospital so they could discuss the future of the royal family, the Queens ex-press secretary has said.  
Dickie Arbiter served the Queen from 1988… [+1381 chars]
